item.title: SAMM YouTube Channel
item.description: Watch SAMM videos From model deep-dive sessions to presentations and project updates, our YouTube channel is a source of information on the project you don’t want to miss. Featured video During the first weekend of November, the SAMM Core Team got together in Boston for an extremely productive few days of discussions and work iterations on the items from our roadmap. Take a look at some of the outcomes.
